definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal

sentences.english: HX showed a multiple effect on oocyte maturation.
sentences.chinese: HX對卵母細胞成熟具有多方面的影響。

sentences.english: At last, the application foreground of freezing technology of porcine oocyte was prospected.
sentences.chinese: 最後，展望了豬卵母細胞冷凍技術的應用前景。

sentences.english: Follicle cells begin to surround oocyte.
sentences.chinese: 濾泡細胞開始包圍卵母細胞。

sentences.english: In order to study parthenogenesis in depth, ES cells from parthenogenetic embryos of mice were isolated and cultured.
sentences.chinese: 對小鼠卵母細胞進行孤雌激活用於單性生殖研究。

sentences.english: The Ovine Oocytes of estrous season was more easier matured in vitro than that of no-estrous season.
sentences.chinese: 發情季節綿羊卵母細胞較乏情季節易成熟。

sentences.english: Cumulus cells play an important role in the intracellular GSH synthesis in oocyte.
sentences.chinese: 卵丘細胞對卵母細胞內的谷胱甘肽合成起重要作用。

sentences.english: The activation of the oocyte was determined by pronuclear formation.
sentences.chinese: 已激活卵母細胞之判定，系以原核之形成予以確認。

sentences.english: The oocyte is effectively a tetraploid cell .
sentences.chinese: 卵母細胞是有效的四倍體細胞。

sentences.english: The oocyte is effectively a tetraploid cell.
sentences.chinese: 卵母細胞是有效的四信體細胞。

sentences.english: However, when oocytes had matured, the membrane potential got significantly depolarized.
sentences.chinese: 然而卵母細胞成熟後，膜電位明顯去極化。

sentences.english: The results have shown that pump ways adapt to collect oocytes.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，抽吸法是合適的卵母細胞採集方法。

sentences.english: The granulosa increasingly disintegrated and the yolk platelet came into being in the oocyte in vitellogenesis .
sentences.chinese: 後期顆粒層解體，卵母細胞內出現大量的卵黃小板。
但是他需要人卵母細胞。

sentences.english: With the increases of follicle diameter, the diameter of nucleoli in oocytes reduced.
sentences.chinese: 隨着卵泡直徑增大，卵母細胞核仁直徑逐漸變小。

sentences.english: Electric activation of porcine oocytes was explored in this study.
sentences.chinese: 研究了電激活參數對豬卵母細胞孤雌發育的影響。

sentences.english: During the period of GV inhibited by HX, the oocyte cytoplasmic is not matured.
sentences.chinese: 在生髮泡抑制期間，卵母細胞胞質並沒有成熟。
